title: Fireside with the Underboss - Maybe I Won't Walk Out of This Basement
description: A made guy named Aldo decides to vandalize one of Sammy's clubs to teach him a lesson.  Aldo, and the rest of the neighborhood, learn to never mess with "The Bull" because you will absolutely get the horns.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: A made guy named Aldo decides to vandalize one of Sammy's clubs to teach him a lesson.  Aldo, and the rest of the neighborhood, learn to never mess with "The Bull" because you will absolutely get the horns.
